name: homebridge-linak
description: A short description about what your plugin does.

scripts.watch: npm run build && npm link && nodemon
scripts.build:commit: ([ -z "$(git status -s)" ] || (echo '[!] Commit changes' && exit 1)) && npm version minor && npm run build && git commit ./dist -m "Build $(node -e 'console.log(require("./dist/constants").VERSION)')"
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:commit && git push && ssh pi@192.168.1.155 'cd ~/homebridge-linak && git pull && sudo hb-service restart'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build:clean
